projects.title: Claim Dispute Management using Blockchain
projects.desc: As a Tier-1 Tele-Communication Company, Verizon services are used by other service providers. Verizon charges them on monthly basis and receive many claims due to lack of transparency with respect to tax computation. We solved them by introducing Blockchain between two partners. The tax-computation logic is developed in collaboration and deployed as smart-contract in both partners infrastructure.
